name: ivfuture/laravel-event-notification
description: Laravel package to send notification through events.

post-install-cmd: npm install express socket.io ioredis redis  --save
pre-autoload-dump: npm install express socket.io ioredis redis  --save
post-autoload-dump: npm install express socket.io ioredis redis  --save
pre-dependencies-solving: npm install express socket.io ioredis redis  --save
post-dependencies-solving: npm install express socket.io ioredis redis  --save
